scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); if (!fs.existsSync('./netlify/functions/views')) fs.mkdirSync('./netlify/functions/views', {recursive: true}); fs.readdirSync('./views').forEach(file => fs.copyFileSync(path.join('./views', file), path.join('./netlify/functions/views', file))); console.log('Views copied to function directory');"
